page.title: 06Annual carnival.
page.content: One of the main events in Brinsley is the yearly carnival. The carnival secretary, Mrs Scothorne, came into school to talk to us about her work and involvement in making it run smoothly. She has been the secretary of the carnival for the last 8 years, and this year Â£1000 was raised. Other organisations hired stalls to raise money for themselves. Â£500 is going to the Queen's Medical Centre Scanner Appeal and Â£500 for amenities in Brinsley. The carnival first began in the 1900's and marching bands from local collieries took part. The present committee has been going since Silver Jubilee year in 1977. The committee consists of 8 women and 7 men. Mrs Scothorne sends many letters to bands,police,council and sponsors. Firework displays are also organized.
